description: Gets information about any operation that returns an operation ID in the response, such as a CreateHttpNamespace request.

parameters.name: OperationId
parameters.description: The ID of the operation that you want to get more information about.

nested_items.name: Operation
nested_items.description: A complex type that contains information about the operation.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the operation that you want to get information about.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The name of the operation that's associated with the specified ID.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the operation. Values include the following:

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: If the value of Status is FAIL, the reason that the operation failed.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The code associated with ErrorMessage. Values for ErrorCode include the following:

nested_items.name: CreateDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the request was submitted, in Unix date/time format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CreateDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: UpdateDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the value of Status changed to the current value, in Unix date/time format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of UpdateDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.
